mapper.select: SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, IFNULL( m.perms, '' ) AS perms, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{loginUserId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ( 'C', 'M' ) AND m.`del_flag` = 0 ORDER BY m.order_num
SELECT r.id FROM user_role ur LEFT JOIN role r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE ur.user_id = #{id} AND r.`status` = '0' AND r.del_flag = '0'
